Translations.Text: dareka vyakti eka na eka tarapha phari rahyo che, tame sadakaryo tarapha bhago, jyam pana tame haso allaha tamane la'i avase, allaha ta'ala dareka vastu para sakti dharave che
tame jyanthi nikalo potanum modhum (namajha mate) masjide harama tarapha kari lo. A ja satya che tamara palanahara taraphathi, je kami pana tame kari rahya cho tenathi allaha ta'ala ajana nathi

ane je jagyathi tame nikalo potanum modhum masjide harama tarapha kari lo ane jyam pana tame cho potanum modhum teni ja tarapha karya karo, jethi lokono ko'i puravo tamara para baki na rahe, sivaya te lokothi je'o'e atyacara karyo che, tame te'othi na daro, marathi ja daro jethi tamara para potani krpa puri karum ane etala mate pana ke tame satya marga pami lo

Jevi rite ame tamara manthi ja eka payagambara avatarita karya je amari ayato tamari samaksa padhe che, ane tamane pavitra kare che, ane tamane kitaba ane hikamata ane te vastu'o sikhavade che jenathi tame ajana hata
etala mate tame mara namanum smarana karo, hum pana tamane yada karisa, maro abhara mano ane krtajnathi baco
